about.introduction: Comprising Science Park, InnoCentre and Industrial Estates, Hong Kong Science & Technology Parks Corporation (HKSTP) is a statutory body dedicated to building a vibrant innovation and technology ecosystem to connect stakeholders.

articles.name: HKSTP wins Technology/IT Incubator of the Year at International Business Innovation Association Awards
HKSTP wins Technology/IT Incubator of the Year at International Business Innovation Association Awards
HKSTP wins Technology/IT Incubator of the Year at International Business Innovation Association Awards

about.introduction: Comprising 科學園, InnoCentre and Industrial Estates, Hong Kong Science & Technology Parks Corporation (HKSTP) is a statutory body dedicated to building a vibrant innovation and technology ecosystem to connect stakeholders.
